name: Box BLOCK Color Pro 2
description:
Box BLOCK Color Pro 2 is a legendary puzzle-based mobile-to-mobile game with brilliant design and more engaging gameplay.This is because it is easy to understand, multi-level play from easy to hard to make players never feel bored or frustrated because it is impossible to pass a table. The goal of the game is to drop blocks into empty positions to fill up the fastest rows to clear them from the board, preventing the blocks from filling the screen.
HOW TO PLAY
Simply drag the blocks to move them.
Try to create full lines on the grid vertically or horizontally.
Blocks can't be rotated.
